data.title: Creating Sustainable Value
data.meta_description: CVC has seven complementary strategies across private equity, secondaries and credit, through which we invest on behalf of pension funds and other leading institutions

Latest news and insights

The latest news and insights from around the CVC network

A diverse portfolio

Europe/Americas

Breitling

Recognised as the inventor of the modern chronograph, Breitling is a leading, independent luxury watch brand with over 130 years of heritage.

A diverse portfolio

Europe/Americas

Six Nations Rugby

Six Nations Rugby is the official organising body of the annual Six Nations Championships and Autumn International Series.

A diverse portfolio

Growth

EcoVadis

One of the world's most trusted providers of business sustainability ratings, intelligence and collaborative performance improvement tools for global supply chains.

A diverse portfolio

Asia

A Bathing Ape

A Bathing Ape is an iconic brand that has defined the fashion industry with its premium streetwear designs since its founding in Tokyo in 1993. Its line up of labels are sold in stores across Asia, North America and Europe.
